itemPrototypes.name: Long Sword
itemPrototypes.description: A finely crafted long sword with a sharp blade, glinting in the light.

verbs.use: You wield the long sword, ready for battle.
verbs.examine: The sword's blade is etched with ancient runes.

itemPrototypes.name: Magic Book
itemPrototypes.description: An ancient tome filled with arcane knowledge and mystical spells.

verbs.use: You open the magic book and begin to recite a spell.
verbs.examine: The book's pages are filled with magical incantations and diagrams.

itemPrototypes.name: Bow
itemPrototypes.description: A sturdy bow made of fine wood, capable of shooting arrows with great precision.

verbs.use: You take aim with the bow, ready to loose an arrow at your target.
verbs.examine: The wood of the bow is polished to a smooth finish, and the string is taut and strong.
